easy-epidemiology.subtitle: Browser-based High Performance Analytics
easy-epidemiology.title:
From Data Input to Analysis,
All on the Web
easy-epidemiology.description:
Easy Epidemiology is a tool that allows you to collect data and analyze it in real-time using only a web browser, without installing any separate programs.

Applying Web Worker and Virtual Scroll technologies, it handles tens of thousands of records without lag. We provide a familiar Spreadsheet UX and automate everything from visualization of key indicators like Epidemic Curves to the final report with a single click.
easy-epidemiology.result: Analysis that took hours is completed instantly upon data entry, generating professional epidemiology reports directly in the browser without external programs.

field.subtitle: Real-time Cohort Management
field.title: Real-time Integrated Cohort Management System
field.description: Developed to resolve on-site confusion caused by varying test durations. By linking tablets and a central status board in real-time, the system automatically guides the next participant whenever a test room becomes free. We automated complex flow management so researchers can focus solely on examinations.
field.result: Converted manual management to real-time automatic assignment, reducing session duration by 15% and completely eliminating on-site confusion.

solution.subtitle: All-in-One Event SaaS Platform
solution.title: All-in-One Solution Unifying 3 Business Models into One System for Solo Operation
solution.description:
Operate three different business types—Private Party, Rotation Dating, and 1:1 Matching—integrated within a single admin page.

Freely configure forms with a custom builder, and automate the entire process from application to payment, QR entry, and web app connection.
solution.result: Integrated 5 tools including application, deposit, SMS, QR, and check-in into one, establishing a solo operation system by automating deposit verification and on-site management.
